Witness says they saw boy, 5, playing near Lower Hutt pond shortly before tragic death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/witness-says-they-saw-boy-playing-near-lower-hutt-pond-shortly-before-tragic-death/L745Y3TY65B4FGWRS555BXADKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/witness-says-they-saw-boy-playing-near-lower-hutt-pond-shortly-before-tragic-death/L745Y3TY65B4FGWRS555BXADKA/ Melissa NightingaleThe witness said council should change the depth of the pond to make it safer.
